summary: Kimberly Latrice Shedrick, Motivational Speaker & WriterMore than a decade of dedicated experience in law, technical and creative writing, marketing, corporations, business management, mental and behavioral health models and best practices; to ownership of a mental health agency poised to acquire $10 billion state and federal mental health contracted services. Yet my most exciting project is just ahead...Black and White in Stripes in Sheriff Joe’s Tent- Memoir of the New American PrincessDr. Kimberly Latrice Shedrick joined together with Christopher Henry Colon (co-author) to write an intimate portrayal of women today and female criminality in America. Kimberly graduated Arizona State University College of Law (August 2002), practiced law for over 14 years. Kimberly was co-founder of five multi-million dollar small businesses including KimberCo Future Leaders Inc., and City Hero Housing Development, Inc. In 2009, Kimberly was found guilty of a crime that would change her life forever.
name: Kimberly (Dr Kim The Messenger) Shedrick
